author: dblevins
msg: The implementation is a bit messy, but ok for now.  As the whole
admin.text package develops, a better design will reveal itself.
The immediate point is to freely develop it without being encumbered

author: dblevins
msg: Added the ability to stop the server.  Just telnet to port 4201 and hit q.
While I was at it, I added a more "official" looking prompt for typing the
quit command.  This turned into another admin console for managing the server.
Just telnet to localhost 4200 and enjoy the new functionality.
New commands can be added *very* easily. Just copy on of the existing commands
A good command to copy from is src/server/org/openejb/server/admin/text/Version.java

author: dblevins
msg: The base for a text console for managing the server.
Right now only a few commands are implemented, but it is extremely easy
